thread.section_title: Bake Me A Wish! Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bake Me A Wish! | www.bakemeawish.com | 10 of 186
thread.title: Shannon
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Shannon

author: Shannon
title: Shannon
text: I ordered a red velvet cake for my twin sons 18th b-day, their favorite. I paid $54.35 for what turned out to be the tiniest, most pathetic cake you've ever seen. There was barely enough for 5 tiny pieces. I was mortified & so upset that this ruined my sons b-day. I will NEVER order from this place again & will let everyone know about my experience so they don't make the same mistake I did.
